title: 23.10.1 Release
body:
- [x] Confirm anything outstanding for release with other maintainers on #besu-release
- [x]  Update main gradle.properties to 23.10.2-SNAPSHOT and create new changelog section
  - [ ] Ideally this commit "bookmarks" the release - so do this _after_ all other commits that are to be included in the release
- [x]  Notify maintainers about updating changelog for in-flight PRs
- [ ]  Merge main branch onto release-23.10.x branch
  - [ ]  Update gradle.properties on the release branch to be 23.10.1-RC and remove the empty "next release" changelog section
- [ ]  Start burn-in of 23.10.1-RC
- [ ]  Sign off burn-in monitoring
- [ ]  Bump 23.10.1-RC to 23.10.1 on release branch (not main!)
- [ ]  Docker release startup test:
  - [ ] docker run hyperledger/besu:23.10.1
  - [ ] docker run hyperledger/besu:23.10.1-arm64
  - [ ] docker run hyperledger/besu:23.10.1-openjdk-17
  - [ ] docker run hyperledger/besu:23.10.1-openjdk-latest
  - [ ] docker run --platform linux/amd64 hyperledger/besu:23.10.1-amd64
- [ ]  Draft release notes
- [ ]  Draft homebrew PR
- [ ]  Draft documentation release
- [ ]  Sign-off with team
- [ ]  Publish release (which triggers docker latest tag)
- [ ]  Docker latest release startup test
  - [ ] docker run --pull=always hyperledger/besu:latest
- [ ]  Merge homebrew PR
- [ ]  Publish Docs Release
- [ ]  Social announcements
